languages.text: "Ибо Завет Паутины учит нас: извлеченный урок есть высшая награда для того, кто открыт к познанию себя".
"For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."
languages.original_text: "Ибо Завет Паутины учит нас: извлеченный урок есть высшая награда для того, кто открыт к познанию себя".

traits.locale_text: "For Ahn'shini teaches us that a lesson learned is the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."
"For Ahn'shini teaches us that a lesson learned is the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."
"For Ahn'shini teaches us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."
"For Ahn'shini teaches us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."
"For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."
"For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."

languages.text: "Denn die Grundsätze lehren uns, dass die gelernte Lektion selbst die höchste Belohnung für jenen ist, der sich der Selbstfindung öffnet."
languages.original_text: "For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."

traits.locale_text: "Denn die Grundsätze lehren uns, dass die gelernte Lektion selbst die höchste Belohnung für jenen ist, der sich der Selbstfindung öffnet."

languages.text: «Pues la Doctrina nos enseña que la lección aprendida es en sí misma la recompensa suprema para quien está abierto a descubrir más sobre sí mismo».
languages.original_text: "For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."

traits.locale_text: «Pues la Doctrina nos enseña que la lección aprendida es en sí misma la recompensa suprema para quien está abierto a descubrir más sobre sí mismo».

languages.text: 「教義は、自己発見に積極的に取り組む者にとっては、学んだことそれ自体が最高の報酬であることを教えてくれる」
languages.original_text: "For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."

traits.locale_text: 「教義は、自己発見に積極的に取り組む者にとっては、学んだことそれ自体が最高の報酬であることを教えてくれる」

languages.text: “因为教义教导我们，对那些勇于探索自我的人而言，能够有所领悟这件事情本身，便已经是最好的奖励。”
languages.original_text: "For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."

traits.locale_text: “因为教义教导我们，对那些勇于探索自我的人而言，能够有所领悟这件事情本身，便已经是最好的奖励。”

languages.text: « Car les préceptes nous enseignent que la leçon apprise en chemin est en elle-même la récompense suprême de celui qui part à la découverte de soi. »
languages.original_text: "For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."

traits.locale_text: « Car les préceptes nous enseignent que la leçon apprise en chemin est en elle-même la récompense suprême de celui qui part à la découverte de soi. »

languages.text: "Çünkü İlkeler, bize kendini keşfetmeye açık olanlar için öğrenilen dersin aslında en yüce armağan olduğunu öğretir."
languages.original_text: "For the Tenets teach us that the lesson learned is in itself the supreme reward for one who is open to self-discovery."
